task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 25°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the roof and assess the full structure from ground to top.
I need to adjust my position to get a better view of the building's base and roof to accurately estimate its height.
I need to move forward to get a closer view of the building's base and roof for a more accurate height estimation.
I need to move forward again to ensure I have a clear view of both the base and the top of the building for an accurate height estimation.
I should look down to ensure I can see the base of the building clearly, which is crucial for estimating its height.
I need to look up again to view the top of the building and combine this with my view of the base for height estimation.
I now have a clear view of both the base and the top of the building, allowing me to estimate its height accurately.
